author: Patrick Cockburn, Patrick Cockburn
title: A pandemic like coronavirus may be reported like a war but it is very different
description: Surviving boredom and isolation requires the right book and a questioning attitude towards politicians and the media
content: I was walking in the early evening down an empty street in Canterbury, wondering how residents were coping with fear and isolation stemming from the coronavirus outbreak. People living there must have been in their houses judging by the cars parked outside, b… [+6881 chars]
